description: [deprecated] Find licenses at target files or environments. This command will be replaced by safety scan, and will be unsupported beyond 1 May 2024.

options.description: Specify a proxy host for network communications.
options.name: --proxy-host

options.description: The API key required for cicd stage or production stage scans.
options.name: --key

options.description: Path to a local license database. Default: empty
options.name: --db

options.description: Whether license database file should be cached. Default: 0 seconds
options.name: --cache

options.description: Read input from one (or multiple) requirement files. Default: empty
options.name: --file
